snippet.title: Soulstice - Accolade Trailer  | Available Now!
snippet.description:
See what Press are saying about Soulstice in the new Soulstice Accolade Trailer.
Soulstice is available now for PlayStation®5, Xbox Series X|S, and PC. 
Visit https://soulsticegame.com for more information and to purchase the physical Deluxe Edition.

The fantasy-inspired world of Soulstice will transport players to places filled with danger and beauty. As sisters Briar and Lute race toward a Tear in the sky that has formed high atop the city of Ilden, increasingly horrific beings known as the Spawn of Chaos continue to pour into their world from the other side of the Veil. Only a Chimera, a powerful living weapon born from the union of two souls, can oppose these vile and ravenous beings.

Explore a dark world brimming with hidden mysteries, master a diverse combat system, and inhabit the dual forces of two sisters in a coming-of-age dark fantasy story with fast-paced action, vicious enemies, and spectacular boss fights.

Players eager to get a taste of Briar’s blitzing weapons-based combat and her sister Lute’s otherworldly arena-commanding abilities can purchase the physical Deluxe Edition from https://store.maximumgames.com/products/soulstice-deluxe-edition 


Follow Us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/modus_games 
Watch us on TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@modusgames 
Like Us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/ModusGames/ 
Join our Discord: https://discord.com/invite/modus
